og.description: Sen. Ryan T. McDougle (R-4) has declared his candidacy for re-election to the Senate of Virginia. He is chairman of the Virginia Senate Republican Caucus.
og.title: ELECTION 2015: McDougle will seek re-election

article_metadata.description: Sen. Ryan T. McDougle (R-4) has declared his candidacy for re-election to the Senate of Virginia. He is chairman of the Virginia Senate Republican Caucus.
